doc:
John Fernside https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Fernside 0 John Fernside is an Australian actor who worked extensively on stage and screen from the 1910s through to 1950s. He is best remembered for co-starring with Chips Rafferty in two popular Australian films of the 1940s, The Overlanders (1946) and Bush Christmas (1947).Fernside was born in Perth, Western Australia and worked his way up through the theatre. John_Fernside is an_Australian_actor who worked extensively on stage_and_screen from the_1910s through to 1950s . He is_best_remembered for co-starring with Chips_Rafferty in two_popular_Australian_films of the_1940s , The_Overlanders ( 1946_)_and_Bush_Christmas_(_1947_) . Fernside was_born in Perth , Western_Australia and worked his_way up through the_theatre .
